text:
Roxy Jacenko recently treated herself to a McLaren 570S sports car worth $500,000 and in addition, she has her beloved Bentley.
And there is no way the 36-year-old is letting her leather seats get soiled by a leaky nappy, so she placed one on the outside of her two-year-old son Hunter's pants.
The mother of two shared a photo to Instagram on Wednesday which showed the normally fashionable tot wearing pull-ups over his khaki pants.

The PR maven captioned the image: 'This toilet training caper gets hectic when needing to travel in the car.
'Solution - knickers on, nappy on the outside, just in case one gets caught short..... leather preserved,' she concluded.
Roxy's fans seemed impressed by her innovation, with one writing, 'This is brilliant! Wish I had thought of this when I was toilet training my little ones ! Such a great tip/trick'.
Another commentator under the story wrote: 'This is actually GOLD! Consider your idea pinched!!'
